verses.1: Topa a muang mite pen liing het loin a om tawntung Zion Mual tawh kibang hi.
verses.2: Jerusalem kimkot ah mualte a om mah bangin ama miteʼ kimkot ah tu-a kipan a tawntungin Topa om ding hi.
verses.3: Thuman mite a khialh khak loh nadingun amau a kipia leitang tungah migilote in amaute uk paisuak lo ding hi.
verses.4: Topa aw, a hoih mite tung le na thupiakna a zui mite tungah hehpihna hong nei in.
verses.5: Ahih hangin amauʼ gitlohna a zuite pen siatna a bawlte gim na piak ciangin amaute tawh pia khawm in. Israel tungah nopna om tahen!
